name: Kowalchack, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Power and Light Company
name_abbreviation: Kowalchack v. Pennsylvania Power & Light Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Kowalchack, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Power and Light Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Daniel H. Shertzer, with him Shertzer & Danforth, for appellant.
Ralph M. Barley, with him John Paul Kershner, and Barley, Snyder, Cooper & Mueller, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kowalchack, Appellant, v. Pennsylvania Power and Light Company.
Argued November 17, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused April 15, 1967.
Daniel H. Shertzer, with him Shertzer & Danforth, for appellant.
Ralph M. Barley, with him John Paul Kershner, and Barley, Snyder, Cooper & Mueller, for appellee.
March 14, 1967:
